name: Resident Evil Revelations 0 DEMO
description:
Several years have passed since the Raccoon City incident. The world is facing a biological threat. Claire Redfield, a survivor of this horrific incident, searched for her brother Chris and finally found him. The Umbrella Corporation, which was behind every incident in the past, is on the brink of destruction. The final court hearing is coming up soon.

Claire, Chris and other familiar characters were invited to a party to celebrate their victory. But they couldn't imagine what nightmare awaits them there...

The events of this visual novel take place some time after the events of the video game "Resident Evil CODE: Veronica" and before the events of "Resident Evil 4".

  • All assets included in the game are not mine.  All sprites, backgrounds, music and sounds belong to CAPCOM.
  • This is a fan game project made just for fun and I don't intend to actively make money from it.
  • Trailer music: The Matrix Reloaded - Chateau · Rob Dougan
  • If you want to show support for this project just give me your feedback!

This is the first demo which includes the whole prologue of the main story. In the future this is what I'm planning to do if many people will like the game/concept:

  • Android/iOS support.
  • Extra and secret episodes.
  • Bigger map to explore and much more character interaction.
  • Inventory and Item Box systems.
  • More interactive puzzles. Combat system.

DISCLAIMER: I'm not in any way affiliated with Capcom. All rights belong to their respective owners. If you haven't played Resident Evil series yet, you should. It's awesome
